statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Given n, k, calculate the number of different (unordered) partitions of n such that no part is repeated k or more times.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
First line, number of test cases, T.
Following are T lines. Each line contains two numbers, n and k.

1<=n,k,T<=105

statement.title: Output
statement.content:
T lines, each line contains answer to the responding test case.
Since the numbers can be very large, you should output them modulo 109+7.
